scripts.download-next: rm -f 'All Domain Values.xml' && curl https://cdx2.epa.gov/wqx/download/DomainValues/All.zip -H "Accept: application/x-zip-compressed" -H "Accept-Encoding: br, gzip, deflate"  -H "Accept-Language: en" -H "User-Agent: DataStreamBot" -o All.zip && unzip All.zip && rm All.zip
scripts.download: rm -f 'All Domain Values.xml' && curl https://cdx.epa.gov/wqx/download/DomainValues/All.zip -H "Accept: application/x-zip-compressed" -H "Accept-Encoding: br, gzip, deflate"  -H "Accept-Language: en" -H "User-Agent: DataStreamBot" -o All.zip && unzip All.zip && rm All.zip
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/json-schema && npm run build:values && npm run build:schema && cp -r src/deprecated dist/ && cp -r src/groups dist/ && cp -r src/required dist/ && cp -r src/values dist/ && cp -r src/descriptions dist/
